Package fr.umlv.Retro

Class FileSystem

java.lang.Object
fr.umlv.Retro.FileSystem
public final class FileSystem
extends java.lang.Object
Representation of a virtual file system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clear()
    Removes files added with a call to write() method.
    static FileSystem create​(java.nio.file.Path root)
    Creates new FileSystem.

    Gets the bytecode of a class file from the disk relative to the given path.
    void save()
    Saves the files to the disk.
    void writeClass​(java.nio.file.Path path, byte[] bytes)

    Adds the given class file to the file system.

    • create

      public static FileSystem create​(java.nio.file.Path root) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates new FileSystem.
      Parameters:
      root - root path of the file system.
      Returns:
      new FileSystem object.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if root is not a valid path.

    • iterate

      public void iterate​(java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.nio.file.Path,​byte[]> consumer) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      Iterates over the files and call the given consumer.
      Parameters:
      consumer - function to call for each file.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • writeClass

    • writeClass

      public void writeClass​(java.nio.file.Path path, java.lang.String clazz, byte[] bytes)
      Adds the given class file to the file system.
      Parameters:
      path - path where to write the class
      clazz - the class name
      bytes - the class bytecode
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Gets the bytecode of a class file from the disk relative to the given path.
      Parameters:
      path - path where to search the class.
      clazz - class name
      consumer - consumer.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException
